description.narrative: By 2020, the child protection authorities are better equipped to implement a political and legal framework around child protection at all levels., which contributes to Access To Justice. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, the most vulnerable girls and boys, especially those at risk of or affected by violence, exploitation and abuse, are better protected in their families and communities by institutions mandated for child protection and the society in general.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2020, the child protection authorities are better equipped to implement a political and legal framework around child protection at all levels.

description.narrative: UNICEF-Burkina Faso technically and financially supported the Government to provide alternative measure to detention to 326 minors in conflict with the law (MCL), including 23 girls. To accelerate the universal birth registration, the CO contributed to the establishment of 12 regional CRVS plans, along with regional steering committees led by the governors. These plans incorporate strategic elements such as the coordination of multi-sectoral actors, operationalization of the interoperable CRVS services across sectors with focus on expansion of secondary civil registration centers in health facilities, allocation of increased national budget at subnational level, and monitoring of plans by the steering committees. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:03/02/2020

title.narrative: Number of municipalities implementing the system approach in accordance with standardized national tools and indicators

target.value: 2020:4 (Code of Criminal Procedure, Child Protection Code and revised Code of Individuals and the Family, National Child Protection Strategy)
